column1: Enquiries about these data can be sent by email to: hle@ons.gov.uk

column5: Proportion of life in good health (%)

column1: 1Ages 16-64. Rates based on figures divided by 16-64 population
2Unemployment rates based on number of unemployed people 16+ divided by the sum of employed people 16+ and unemployed people 16+
3Smoking prevalence is for ages 18+ estimated by ONS using Annual Population Survey data for 2015
4Value for Hackney and City of London combined; value for Cornwall & Isles of Scilly combined
5Value for Cornwall and Isles of Scilly combined
